member.name: T:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.VersionResource
member.summary: Describes which version resource fixed-value to read.

member.name: F:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.VersionResource.FILEVERSION
member.summary: Binary version number for the file. The version consists of two 32-bit integers, defined by four 16-bit integers. For example, "FILEVERSION 3,10,0,61" is translated into two doublewords: 0x0003000a and 0x0000003d, in that order. Therefore, if version is defined by the DWORD values dw1 and dw2, they need to appear in the FILEVERSION statement as follows: HIWORD(dw1), LOWORD(dw1), HIWORD(dw2), LOWORD(dw2).

member.name: F:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.VersionResource.PRODUCTVERSION
member.summary: Binary version number for the product with which the file is distributed. The version parameter is two 32-bit integers, defined by four 16-bit integers. For more information about version, see the FILEVERSION description.

member.summary: Create the extracted file if it doesn't already exist locally.

member.summary: Create or replace a locally existing file with the extracted one of the same name.

member.name: F:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.ZipExtractFileDisposition.DeleteIfPresent
member.summary: Delete the local file, if found.

member.summary: The details of the selected .

member.summary: URL pointing to a help article opening when an update error occurred.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.MergedConfig.DownloadLocation
member.summary: The preferred setup download directory.
member.remarks: By default, a temporary directory of the current user is used.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.MergedConfig.RunAsTemporaryCopy
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the updater should run as a temporary copy instead from the origin directory.
member.example: This feature is useful when the updater is shipped with a product using Windows Installer, which detects open processes that block an upgrade. Enabling this setting re-launches the updater process from a temporary copy so on-the-fly upgrades in the origin directory become possible.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.SharedConfig.RunAsTemporaryCopy
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the updater should run as a temporary copy instead from the origin directory.
member.example: This feature is useful when the updater is shipped with a product using Windows Installer, which detects open processes that block an upgrade. Enabling this setting re-launches the updater process from a temporary copy so on-the-fly upgrades in the origin directory become possible.

member.name: T:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.SignatureComparisonPolicy
member.summary: The policy to abide by when comparing signatures.

member.name: F:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.SignatureComparisonPolicy.Relaxed
member.summary: Allows the user to make the decision to continue when the remote setup signature doesn't match the expected value. This is the default.

member.name: F:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.SignatureComparisonPolicy.Strict
member.summary: Fails with an error when the remote setup signature doesn't match the expected value.
member.remarks: If is configured and the updater binary is not signed properly, applying updates will always fail with an error.

member.name: T:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.SignatureVerificationStrategy
member.summary: The strategy on how to verify if the setup signature is trusted.

member.name: F:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.SignatureVerificationStrategy.FromUpdaterBinary
member.summary: Extract the signature information from the updater binary and use that info to validate the signed setup.
member.remarks: If is configured and the updater binary is not signed properly, applying updates will always fail with an error.

member.name: F:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.SignatureVerificationStrategy.FromConfiguration
member.summary: Use the information provided in the to validate the signed setup.

member.name: T:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.SignatureConfig
member.summary: Authenticode signature details.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.SignatureConfig.IssuerName
member.summary: The issuer name (CA display name).

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.SignatureConfig.SubjectName
member.summary: The subject name (e.g. friendly signer company name).

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.SignatureConfig.SerialNumber
member.summary: The signing certificate serial number as a hex-string. The format depends on the CA used.

member.summary: One or more exit codes that signify success.

member.summary: The checksum/hash value to compare against.

member.summary: The algorithm to use to calculate the checksum/hash.

member.name: T:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease
member.summary: Represents an update release.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.Name
member.summary: Simple display name of the release.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.Version
member.summary: Semantic version of the release.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.Summary
member.summary: Summary/changelog/description of the release. Supports Markdown syntax.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.PublishedAt
member.summary: The release publish timestamp.
member.remarks: Releases are sorted on the client by descending , even if the publish date doesn't match the order of the release.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.DownloadUrl
member.summary: The URL to the new product setup. Redirects are supported.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.DownloadSize
member.summary: Optional size (in bytes) of the download target. If this is not set, the UI will simply display "N/A" until the actual download starts.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.LaunchArguments
member.summary: Optional arguments to pass to the setup process.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.ExitCode
member.summary: Setup exit code parameters.
member.remarks: You can use instead to apply to all releases.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.Checksum
member.summary: Optional checksum/hashing settings to perform after download.
member.remarks: This simply hashes the file contents and compares them, there is no cryptographic signature validation performed. It can be used to ensure that the file hasn't been corrupted in transit but doesn't say anything about the authenticity or origin of the file.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.Disabled
member.summary: Skips/disables this release on the client if set.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.DetectionChecksum
member.summary: The file hash to use in product detection. This can differ from .
member.remarks: This simply hashes the file contents and compares them, there is no cryptographic signature validation performed. It can be used to ensure that the file hasn't been corrupted in transit but doesn't say anything about the authenticity or origin of the file.

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.DetectionSize
member.summary: The size value (in bytes) used in product detection. This can differ from .

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.DetectionVersion
member.summary: The version used in product detection. This can differ from .

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.ZipExtractDefaultFileDisposition
member.summary: Specifies how to handle files in a zip update, unless overriden via .

member.name: P:Nefarius.Vicius.Abstractions.Models.UpdateRelease.ZipExtractFileDispositionOverrides
member.summary: Overrides the behavior for specific files in a zip update. Trumps if set.

member.summary: An instance returned by the remote update API.
